    DynamicAnchor

    public static class DynamicAnchor.PreferredOrientation
extends IComputationStrategy.Parameter<javafx.geometry.Orientation>
    An IComputationStrategy.Parameter that encapsulates the preferred orientation to be used for orthogonal projections.
